activities.name: code.name.monkey.retromusic.activities.LicenseActivity

dynamic_properties.effect: Controls app bar appearance behavior during scroll events.
Navigates back to the previous activity when the back arrow is clicked.
Holds scrollable content and works with AppBarLayout for coordinated scrolling behavior.
Displays the license HTML content inside a custom WebView component with proper theming applied.

activities.summary: This activity is used to display the application's license information in a WebView. It loads an HTML file from assets, dynamically applies theme-based styling for compatibility with WebView, and provides a back navigation option through the toolbar.

activities.name: code.name.monkey.retromusic.activities.LockScreenActivity

dynamic_properties.effect: shows a blurred background image based on the current song's album art.
holds the album cover image with rounded corners and elevation for visual emphasis.
shows the current song's album art which is updated dynamically during playback.
loads the LockScreenControlsFragment that provides playback control buttons like play/pause and next/previous.
shows instructional text indicating that the user can swipe down to dismiss the lock screen.

activities.summary: The LockScreenActivity displays playback controls over the lock screen when music is playing. It initializes lock-screen behavior, loads album art dynamically, updates UI components with song metadata, and allows swipe-to-dismiss gesture to close the activity.

activities.name: code.name.monkey.retromusic.fragments.backup.RestoreActivity

dynamic_properties.effect: shows the name of the selected backup file
displays the backup file name in a non-editable format
informs the user to choose what type of data to restore
toggles selection of app settings to be restored
toggles selection of playlists to be restored
toggles selection of user-added images to be restored
toggles selection of custom artist images to be restored
closes the current activity without performing any restoration
starts the restoration process with selected data types and dismisses the activity

activities.summary: This activity is used for restoring data from a backup file. It allows users to select what content to restore, such as settings, playlists, and images, and initiates the restoration process upon user confirmation.

activities.name: code.name.monkey.retromusic.activities.base.AbsBaseActivity
activities.summary: This activity serves as a base class for other activities in the app, providing common functionality such as permission handling, keyboard dismissal on touch outside EditText, and key event interception. It also includes methods to manage overflow menus and display appropriate UI responses based on permission requests.

activities.name: code.name.monkey.retromusic.activities.base.AbsThemeActivity
activities.summary: AbsThemeActivity serves as a base activity for handling theme-related configurations, immersive fullscreen mode, locale and split compatibility management, and system UI customizations in Android.

activities.name: code.name.monkey.retromusic.activities.SupportDevelopmentActivity

dynamic_properties.effect: navigates back using onBackPressed dispatcher.
opens an external URL for donations via Ko-fi.

activities.summary: This activity is used to support development, specifically by providing a donation option through external links such as Ko-fi.

activities.name: code.name.monkey.retromusic.activities.tageditor.AbsTagEditorActivity
activities.summary: This activity serves as a base class for tag editing functionality in a music application, providing tools to modify metadata of audio files such as song title, artist, album, and cover art. It supports saving changes, image manipulation (e.g., selecting from gallery or searching on web), handling data changes, and cleaning up temporary files upon exit.

activities.name: code.name.monkey.retromusic.appshortcuts.AppShortcutLauncherActivity
activities.summary: This activity is used to handle app shortcut actions for launching specific playlists or modes in the background music service, such as Shuffle All, Top Tracks, and Last Added. It immediately starts the MusicService with the appropriate playlist and shuffle mode and then finishes.

activities.name: code.name.monkey.retromusic.activities.tageditor.AlbumTagEditorActivity
activities.summary: The AlbumTagEditorActivity is used for editing album metadata such as title, artist, genre, and year, as well as managing album artwork. It allows users to load or delete album art, save changes to tags, search for images on the web, and provides UI transitions and color customization.

activities.name: code.name.monkey.retromusic.activities.base.AbsMusicServiceActivity
activities.summary: This activity serves as a base class for music-related activities that interact with a music playback service. It manages the connection to the service, listens for music state changes (like play state, metadata, queue changes), and handles permission requests. It also supports event broadcasting to registered listeners for various music service events.

activities.name: code.name.monkey.retromusic.activities.DriveModeActivity
activities.summary: DriveModeActivity provides a simplified music playback interface optimized for driving scenarios. It allows users to control media playback (play/pause, next/previous, shuffle, repeat), view current song details (title, artist, album art), toggle favorite songs, and adjust playback progress.

activities.name: code.name.monkey.retromusic.activities.MainActivity
activities.summary: This activity serves as the main interface of the app, responsible for initializing UI configurations, handling navigation, displaying changelogs on first launch, and managing user interactions through dynamic tabs and bottom navigation.

activities.name: code.name.monkey.retromusic.activities.base.AbsSlidingMusicPanelActivity

dynamic_properties.effect: Hosts primary content including fragments and navigation components with CoordinatorLayout to manage interactions between appbar and scrolling views.
Acts as a NavHostFragment to display main navigation destinations like Home, Library, or other screens using Navigation Component.
BottomSheetBehavior-enabled container that allows sliding up/down of the music player panel; supports hideable behavior and edge-to-edge display.
FrameLayout placeholder where full player fragment is displayed when the bottom sheet is expanded.
Triggers expansion of the music panel to show full player UI when the mini-player is clicked.
Material3 BottomNavigationView allowing switching between different tabs or sections of the app like Music, Playlist, Queue.

activities.summary: This activity, AbsSlidingMusicPanelActivity, serves as a base for managing a sliding music player panel in a music application. It supports dynamic theme-based fragment selection (e.g., Blur, Adaptive, Normal), handles UI transitions such as expanding and collapsing the music panel, manages bottom navigation visibility, and updates UI elements like colors, mini-player behavior, and task description based on playback state and user preferences.

activities.name: code.name.monkey.retromusic.activities.PermissionActivity

dynamic_properties.effect: shows the application title styled with accent color.
provides a visual break between the title and permission items.

static_properties.permissionTitleSubTitle: The app needs permission to access your device storage for playing music

dynamic_properties.effect: directs the user to grant or manage storage permissions via system settings.

static_properties.permissionTitleSubTitle: The app needs nearby devices permission to check for bluetooth devices

dynamic_properties.effect: prompts the user to grant Bluetooth connectivity permissions if not already granted.

static_properties.permissionTitleSubTitle: The app needs permission to access your device settings in order to set music as Ringtone

dynamic_properties.effect: guides the user to allow write settings permission for setting ringtones (only applicable on Marshmallow and above).

static_properties.permissionTitleSubTitle: The app needs permission to schedule exact alarms to set sleep timers

dynamic_properties.effect: requests permission to schedule exact alarms for sleep timers (applicable only on Android S or higher).
transitions the user to the main music player activity if all required permissions are granted.

activities.summary: The PermissionActivity is responsible for checking and managing runtime permissions required by the app, such as storage access, Bluetooth connectivity, audio settings, and alarm scheduling. It dynamically adjusts UI elements based on Android version, guides users to grant necessary permissions, and transitions to the main app activity once all required permissions are satisfied.

activities.name: code.name.monkey.retromusic.activities.saf.SAFGuideActivity

dynamic_properties.effect: shows a large scenic image with a parallax effect to enhance user engagement.
presents the title text for the current slide or screen in the SAF guide.

static_properties.text: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur, adipisci velit, …

dynamic_properties.effect: shows a brief description or explanation related to the current SAF guide step.

activities.summary: This activity is used to guide users through Storage Access Framework (SAF) setup, likely providing information or steps for granting storage permissions using a visually descriptive layout.

activities.name: code.name.monkey.retromusic.activities.ErrorActivity
activities.summary: This activity is used to handle and display error messages, providing options for the user to navigate to configuration settings or return to the main login interface.

activities.name: code.name.monkey.retromusic.activities.bugreport.BugReportActivity

static_properties.text: You will be forwarded to the issue tracker website.

activities.summary: BugReportActivity provides an interface for users to report bugs. It displays device information, allows copying of this information to the clipboard, and redirects users to an external issue tracker website.

activities.name: code.name.monkey.retromusic.activities.tageditor.SongTagEditorActivity
activities.summary: SongTagEditorActivity is used for editing song metadata such as title, artist, album, genre, year, track number, disc number, lyrics, and composer. It also supports managing album art by loading, deleting, or searching for images online. The activity handles saving updated tag information to files and provides UI customization based on the loaded content.
